title: How Matteo Jorgenson Won Paris-Nice: ‘I Saw Hesitation Between Remco and Primož’
content:
The American star lifts the lid on opportunistic tactics that won him 'strange' Paris-Nice and frustration with Skjelmose: 'I won the race on La Colle-sur-Loup.'

Read the full article at How Matteo Jorgenson Won Paris-Nice: ‘I Saw Hesitation Between Remco and Primož’ on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
